title: Japan tech giant SoftBank Group posts profit
description: Japanese technology conglomerate SoftBank Group Corp. posted a 421.8 billion yen (US$2.9 billion) profit in the April-June quarter, rebounding from a loss a year earlier as its investments benefited from the craze for artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Scientists want to prevent AI from going rogue by teaching it to be bad first
description: Researchers are trying to “vaccinate” artificial intelligence systems against developing evil, overly flattering or otherwise harmful personality traits in a seemingly counterintuitive way: by giving them a small dose of those problematic traits.
content:

title: SoftBank Concedes Stargate Project With OpenAI Needs More Time
description: SoftBank Group Corp. said it’s taking longer than anticipated to get Stargate off the ground, conceding for the first time that the $500 billion artificial intelligence tie-up in the US with OpenAI is bogging down.
content:

title: Google Pledges $1 Billion For AI Training At US Universities, Aims To Expand Globally
description: In a strategic move, Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOGL) (NASDAQ: GOOG) subsidiary Google has committed $1 billion to provide artificial intelligence (AI) offering educational resources and technical assistance to U.S. colleges and nonprofits.

title: China's new AI threat: Companies collecting data for influence campaign from Hong Kong to US
description: China is increasingly using artificial intelligence to shape public opinion and expand its global influence, according to a new report based on insights from current and former US officials. A state-linked company, GoLaxy, has been at the center of these efforts.

title: NSW Labor just sneaked in this regulation on monitoring workers
description: The Minns government has included the country’s first express regulation of artificial intelligence in a workers compensation bill, backing union rights to lift the hood on digital work systems.
content: The Minns government has sneaked the country’s first express regulation of artificial intelligence into its workers’ compensation reforms, backing new rights for unions to enter workplaces to lift the hood on AI systems and limit the technology’s abi... [266 chars]

title: SoftBank Swings to Profit on Vision Fund Gains Ahead of AI Push
description: SoftBank Group Corp. swung to a bigger-than-expected profit in the June quarter, riding on gains from its bets on Nvidia Corp. and startups in a boost for founder Masayoshi Son’s bets on artificial intelligence technologies.
content:

title: AI and extended reality successfully train surgical trainees without instructors
description: Mount Sinai researchers have demonstrated the effectiveness of teaching surgical trainees a difficult procedure using artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms and an extended-reality headset without the presence of an instructor.
